attributes.action: encourage publically the CPS to prosecute MPs who have abused the second home allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Encourage, by public announcement, that the CPS should prosecute any politician who has abused the second home allowance system by flipping their homes. This to apply to Ministers along with MPs.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the CPS in this way.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
